name: Framework360 Connect
author: Framework360

sections.description:
Framework360 is the essential cloud software for true digital marketing professionals.
Framework360 is an All-in-One marketing platform, which allows you to manage all your marketing activities from a single space.

Use Framework360 Connect to:

  • Send all the contacts of your WordPress site on Framework
  • Submit all leads obtained through Elementor forms on Framework360
  • Submit Woocommerce Abandoned Carts on Framework360

Some functionality of Framework360:

Website builder
Build your dynamic website with the Block Visual Builder.

Landing page builder
Build your effective landing pages with our Block Visual Builder.

Ecommerce builder
Create your online store and sell in all languages and currencies of the world.

Marketing Automation
Create endless marketing automations with Email and SMS.

Popup builder
Create endless popups on the site with beautiful effects.

Form builder
Create endless forms with marketing-oriented themes.

Multilingual
Translate your website or landing page into all languages of the world.

Blog
Create your blog and add endless SEO oriented articles.

CRM
Add infinite customer and leads data and keep in touch with them.

Email marketing
Send endless newsletters to your customers even on a scheduled basis.

SMS marketing
Send endless sms to your customers even in a programmed way.

Tracking platform
Advanced monitoring of website or landing page visitors.

Sales management
Manage all online and offline sales from a single panel.

Messages
Receive multi-channel messages and reply with customized templates.

Report
Generate advanced, easy-to-read reports and download them in Excel or PDF.

Funnel builder
Create endless sales funnels and convert visitors into customers.

Push notifications
Send endless push notifications to your customers even on a scheduled basis.

Video-courses
Create video courses and show them to your customers in their reserved area.

Membership
Create a membership system for your paid content.

Calendar
Schedule appointments with your customers and send automatic reminders.

API
Integrate the platform with any external tool through the API.
sections.faq:
Requirements

  • Your website or blog must be using WordPress.org version 3.7 or higher on your server. We recommend the latest version.
  • An active account on the Framework360 platform

What does the plugin do?

Framework360 Connect allows you to synchronize all the contacts obtained through your wordpress site on the Framework360 platform
